mainEntityOfPage.description: Route4Me's cloud-based system automatically sends alerts (SMS/email) to customers when they are the next stop to be visited on an active route. Customers appreciate being kept informed and can prepare for your team member's arrival, helping avoid delays and stay on schedule. The system can send automatic SMS text messages and emails with tracking URLs so customers can see where your driver is as they approach. Alert templates are fully customizable to match your needs.
